WorkItem.Description:
Hi, 

We have used Umbraco Full Text Search 6.1.2 integrated in our umbraco 6.1.3 Website, but it serached with Chinese Searchwords and found nothing, although that Chinese Searchwords are absolutely in the Web site. With its eng. Searchwords it will be found. 

Does Umbraco Full Text Search support Uni-code search, and how could i fix it?

Thanks a lot!
WorkItem.Summary: Umbraco Full Text Search doesn't support chinese Searchwords
